div.p: A formatting element for marking words or phrases that are emphasized for linguistic effect or specially formatted. Use render to specify the kind of emphasis, e.g., bold or italic, or formatting, e.g. superscript or subscript.
When the content of an entire element should always be rendered in italics or some other display feature, use the style sheet functions instead of emph.
